Localization.Name: Clempt Pants Green
Localization.Description: Carrying Capacity: 2K µSCU\n\nStegman's factory pants have been taken to the next level with the Clempt line. These rugged all-purpose pants come with double knees for extra comfort and protection and are made from tough composite weave fabric to last as long as the work needs.
